title: Executive Order 5074-Authorizing the Reinstatement of Raymond F. Mulherin
content: Mr. Raymond F. Mulherin, for many years a post office employee and post office inspector, may be reinstated to an appropriate position in the classified service without regard to the time limit upon his eligibility for reinstatement.
citation: Calvin Coolidge, Executive Order 5074-Authorizing the Reinstatement of Raymond F. Mulherin Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/360791
